snippet.title: Brad Has A Trailer
snippet.description:
Brad Has A Pain, the sequel to Alex Has A Point by Scary Lemon.
Play the game here! https://scary-lemon.itch.io/brad-has-a-pain

Art in this video by Nathanial
Music in this video by Scratch and Sniff, Full version here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=57JeqmxkT3A
Special thanks to Jimmy for additional help with the trailer
